name: Mediabarn
description: Created in 2003, Mediabarn is a strategic interactive agency that offers design and development services as well as professional placement services and a state-of-the-art usability testing lab and market research facility. Using the right blend of innovation, energy, and know-how, our mission is to make the Internet work for our clients. Our diverse portfolio of capabilities affords us the ability to serve up flexible solutions for practically all of your interactive needs.
